```{r setup}
library(effectbounds)
```

```{r data}
dat <- simulate_ate_example(seed = 1, N = 5e2, alpha = 3, beta = 0.1, gamma = 1)
```

```{r bounds}
bounds <- ate(dat, X = c("X1", "X2"), A = "A", Y = "Y", thresholds = c(10^seq(-3, -0.5, 0.1)), smoothness = c(0.005))
```

```{r}
summary(bounds)
```

```{r}
plot(bounds, point_estimate = TRUE)
```
